description: Try our easy to follow Citrus Mojito Mocktail recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Citrus Mojito Mocktail Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly massage mint leaves with your hands to release aromas. Add to jug with lime and orange slices. Top with ice and mineral water, and serve.
